## 🔐 Requirements

- 🐳 Docker Compose

  > I use [🔮 OrbStack](https://orbstack.dev).

<br /><br />

## 🔧 Setup

1. 📋 Clone this Repository

   ```shell
   git clone https://github.com/5ouma/homelab.git
   ```

2. 📝 Follow the instructions below

   - [🪐 **Misskey**](../misskey)
   - [🌸 **Immich**](../immich)
   - [🐇 **Speedtest Tracker**](../speedtest-tracker)
